title: 71: Bachelor in Paradise: Week 3 (Part 6)
itunes:title: 71: Bachelor in Paradise: Week 3 (Part 6)
description:
The Broads discuss the second episode of the week! They chat Daddy Chris, their strong opinions regarding the Kristina/Caitlyn conversation, Katie’s “self sabotage, vomiting and love ties, our introduction to Kristian, and much more!
Chatty Broads is produced and recorded @theblueroommedia www.theblueroommedia.com (http://www.theblueroommedia.com/)
